PressTV-Trump asks for $6bn rise in US military spending PressTV-Trump asks for $6bn rise in US military spending By 0 71 
Touring Asia to muster support for stronger action against North Korea, US President Donald Trump has asked Congress to raise military spending by $6 billion. 
As the American head of state was preparing to leave Japan on Monday, news broke that he had asked lawmakers for $4 billion to complete the installation of the Terminal High Altitude Missile Defense (THAAD) system in South Korea. 
Washington says the system is supposed to defend Japan and South Korea from the North’s missiles, but Russia and China say the THAAD’s advanced radar could spy on their territories. 
The budget request also includes $1.2 billion to fund his request for sending 3,500 additional troops to Afghanistan, part of a new plan that he unveiled in August to prolong US military presence in the war-torn country. 
The remaining $700 million will be used to repair two US Navy ships in the Pacific fleet — USS John S. McCain and USS Fitzgerald — which were heavily…

Home View All Jobs ( 2,177,418 ) Paychex Human Capital Management Sales Consultant in Bakersfield , California 
More than just a paycheck.* Paychex is the leader in the small and mid-market space for Truly Human, Human Capital Management. We help business owners and leaders attract the best talent through streamlined human resource processes and benefits packages while at the same time maximizing the productivity of their employees once onboard. We often hear that the best thing about Paychex is our commitment to culture. Here you will find a company that rallies behind its values and builds its strategies around them. At Paychex, we value loyalty. Through hard work and ongoing growth and development, doors open. Many of our Executives came up through the ranks at Paychex, and for that we are #paychexproud. 
Only the best need apply.* We're on a journey to record-breaking revenue and we need only the best to join our team. Paychex representatives are relentlessly driven to be successful and are passionate about creating solutions that meet the needs of their clients. Our reps are sharp, impressive people who are leaders in their daily lives. 
All in. All the time.* The success of a Paychex rep depends on their ability to maximize their daily activity. This is a solution-based sales environment with an entrepreneurial spirit. The compensation plan rewards those who succeed and multiplier levels favor ongoing success. Integrated selling is the new norm as our clients' needs span multiple product lines and you are compensated for your team work. A portion of your leads will come from building external referral sources and a portion are developed from our internal team. There are dollars in the hustle and most leads are self-generated through a structured, proven activity plan. 
/ But enough about us, let's talk about you./ 
In this role, you will: 
Market and sell our suite of services by prospecting and acquiring new clients. 
Schedule appointments utilizing multiple communication channels (phone, email, marketing campaigns). 
Develop relationships with potential and current referral sources. 
Develop rapport and evaluate the business owner/decision maker?s Human Capital Management needs, determining which products are appropriate and referring to internal partners as needed. 
Project a positive image consistent with our values in representing Paychex to clients and the community. 
Strive to consistently gain technical, competitive and sales skills knowledge to stay agile and relevant in today?s business climate. So what are you waiting for?* If you're reading this and it sounds like we're writing about you, apply online at www.paychex.com/careers. Check out our leadership team on LinkedIn and get an inside peek at our culture @insidepaychex.

posts.author: Berita
posts.title: Waris perlu tampil jika peminjam PTPTN mati, hilang upaya
posts.text:
Waris perlu tampil jika peminjam PTPTN mati, hilang upaya   
Waris peminjam PTPTN perlu memaklumkan tentang kematian atau kehilangan upaya peminjam agar mereka tidak dibebani hutang. ― Foto fail REMBAU, 7 Nov – Perbadanan Tabung Pendidikan Tinggi Nasional (PTPTN) meminta waris kepada peminjam tabung berkenaan yang meninggal dunia supaya tampil memaklumkan perkara berkenaan bagi tujuan pelupusan hutang. 
Pengurus Besar Kanan, Jabatan Pemasaran dan Komunikasi Strategik PTPTN, Abdul Ghaffar Yusop berkata ini penting bagi memastikan waris tidak dibebani hutang memandangkan pinjaman tersebut dilindungi Skim Perlindungan Takaful Berkelompok. 
“Melalui manfaat Skim Perlindungan Takaful Berkelompok Pinjaman Pendidikan PTPTN, kesemua pinjaman itu diselesaikan sepenuhnya oleh syarikat insurans dan pada masa sama waris akan menerima khairat kematian RM1,500. 
“Jadi, waris tidak perlu membayar hutang peminjam yang meninggal dunia atau mengalami keilatan kekal kerana semuanya dilindungi sepenuhnya takaful,” katanya selepas majlis penyerahan manfaat takaful dan khairat kematian kepada waris Muhamad Zaki Abu Hassan, 39, yang maut kemalangan di Labu, Seremban, 19 Jun lepas. 
Pada majlis itu, Abdul Ghaffar menyerahkan cek berjumlah RM127,515.12 kepada isteri Muhamad Zaki, Sarina Abdul Manap, 40, di kediamannya di sini, hari ini. 
Mengulas lanjut, Abdul Ghaffar berkata sehingga 31 Okt lepas, 7,647 peminjam mendapat manfaat perlindungan takaful berjumlah RM124.87 juta, melibatkan soal kematian dan hilang upaya kekal. 
PTPTN, beliau berkata sentiasa menitikberatkan kebajikan peminjamnya, dan Skim Pinjaman Pendidikan PTPTN dengan perlindungan takaful berkelompok dibuat bertujuan melindungi peminjam sekiranya berlaku kematian atau hilang upaya kekal. 
“Seperti Allahyarham Muhamad Zaki, beliau graduan sarjana muda Universiti Teknologi Mara (UiTM) Shah Alam, dan semasa hayatnya arwah mempunyai hutang pinjaman berjumlah RM36,281. Namun kerana manfaat perlindungan takaful berkelompok, kesemua pinjaman itu selesai sepenuhnya,” katanya. 
Selain menjadi peminjam PTPTN, beliau berkata Muhamad Zaki juga pendeposit akaun Skim Simpanan Pendidikan Nasional (SSPN-i Plus) untuk tiga anaknya berusia dua hingga 11 tahun, sekali gus melayakkan menerima manfaat perlindungan takaful akibat kemalangan RM40,000 bagi setiap akaun dan RM2,500 khairat kematian bagi setiap akaun. 
“Pada masa sama waris turut menerima nilai tunai bagi simpanan takaful sebanyak RM5.04 bagi setiap akaun. Jumlah keseluruhan manfaat takaful dan khairat kematian serta nilai tunai diterima waris kerana arwah merupakan pendeposit SSPN-i Plus adalah berjumlah RM127,515.12,” katanya. 
Abdul Ghaffar berkata sehingga 30 Sept lepas, sebanyak 134,848 akuan SSPN-i Plus dibuka membabitkan jumlah deposit terkumpul sebanyak RM47.4 juta dengan manfaat perlindungan takaful sehingga RM6.2 bilion. ― Bernama

thread.title: Marks & spencer presents ‘paddington™ and the christmas visitor’
thread.title_full: Marks & spencer presents ‘paddington™ and the christmas visitor’

posts.author: salini
posts.title: Marks & spencer presents ‘paddington™ and the christmas visitor’
posts.text:
Partnering together for a family focused campaign ahead of the release of Paddington 2 
In a first for M&S, the advert has also been turned into a storybook with all profits being donated to the NSPCC 
This festive season, M&S has teamed up with a treasured British icon to create a truly special Christmas – as Paddington is unveiled as the star of Marks & Spencer’s Campaign for 2017, which will launch with the hashtag, #LoveTheBear. 
The timely tie up follows the star-studded World Premiere of STUDIOCANAL and Heyday Film’s Paddington 2 this past weekend, with the family film going on general release this Friday (10th November). 
The advert ‘Paddington and the Christmas Visitor’, created by Grey London, which airs today (Tuesday 7th November) is a festive, family focused tale that tells the story of how everyone’s favourite bear, Paddington, unknowingly saves Christmas for his friends and neighbours. 
It’s Christmas Eve at Windsor Gardens and Paddington is fast asleep. However, his dreams of marmalade are interrupted by a loud thud on the roof. Upon investigation, he stumbles upon a burglar and despite the burglar’s protests that he is “not Santa” the determined and good-natured bear begins to ‘help’ him deliver the presents back to where they belong. Seeing the good in everyone, Paddington innocently helps the burglar see the error of his ways and as they place presents into personalised stockings and pause for mince pies, he unknowingly averts a crisis and ensures a truly special moment for neighbour Alice, and a happy Christmas for all. 
In a first for M&S, the heart-warming story of the advert has been turned into a children’s Christmas storybook available in stores and online for £3. All profits will be donated to the NSPCC to help fund its vital Childline service over the Christmas season. To launch the book, M&S will also host a series of book readings for children at stores around the UK – starting at its flagship Marble Arch store on Friday (10th November). 
The campaign retains the philosophy of M&S’ ‘Spend it Well’ brand platform launched earlier this year – encouraging customers to focus on the people, experiences and things that matter to them most, something that is never more important than at Christmas. 
Paddington, who is named after the famous area of London where M&S is also based, will take a lead role in helping the retailer create a series of special moments for its customers and the communities it serves through partnership activity. 
Patrick Bousquet-Chavanne, Executive Director of Customer, Marketing & M&S.com said: “At M&S our customers are at the heart of everything we do and we know they love the magic of Christmas, most of all spending time with family and friends. Paddington has enchanted children and families all over the world for nearly 60 years which is why we couldn’t turn down the chance to bring the wonderfully endearing, much-loved British character and his world into the heart of our Christmas campaign this year. We always want to surprise and delight our customers; the timing is perfect as we’re partnering together just ahead of the release of Paddington 2.” 
Rob Weston, Brand & Marketing Director at M&S said: “Paddington injects the sense of joy, love and neighbourly spirit that makes Christmas feel magical and our story reflects the inclusive, make the most of every moment approach that we take to our customer conversations.” 
Partnership Activity 
Cinema 
M&S’ media partner, Mindshare, have worked with Digital Cinema Media to ensure the 90 second advert is shown before the start of every screening of Paddington 2. M&S is also running dedicated screenings of the film for Sparks members and their children, as well as in the ten communities it’s supporting through Plan A 2025. 
In-store 
For the first time M&S will host a dedicated campaign shop to support its Christmas advertising campaign. Bespoke signage will lead customers to The Paddington Shop – housing over 90 themed products, the majority in kidswear, and of course Paddington’s favourite marmalade will be available in M&S Foodhalls. In another first, the iconic bear will be the first ever film character to star in the M&S Christmas windows. 
In to December, M&S’ team of in-store ‘Moment Makers’ will be surprising and delighting customers with Paddington-themed ‘Random Acts of Kindness’ – from a free marmalade sandwich in the café, to a cheeky Paddington chocolate at the till. 
Online and Social 
The retailer will bring Paddington’s iconic character to life for customers in a fully integrated cross channel campaign. The much-loved bear will take part in his first ever interview for M&S’ content hub Style & Living and there’ll be downloadable festive marmalade recipes suitable for all the family. Underpinning the entire campaign will be social support encouraging customers to #LoveTheBear. 
Marks & spencer presents ‘paddington™ and the christmas visitor’ added by salini on 07/11/2017

posts.author: Mohamed. L. / version française: Moussa. K.
posts.title: L’Algérie investit 2 mds USD dans le plus grand champ gazier
posts.text:
L’Algérie investit 2 mds USD dans le plus grand champ gazier 2017/11/07 0 Mohamed. L. / version française: Moussa. K. 
La compagnie pétrolière algérienne "Sonatrach" a lancé de nouveaux investissements de l’ordre de 2 milliards de dollars dans le champ gazier de Hassi R’mel, et ce pour maintenir une production stable au niveau du plus grand champ gazier du pays. Apparentés Mahmoud Abbas salue le soutien « indéfectible » de l’Algérie à la cause Palestinienne Le Président-directeur général (P-dg) de Sonatrach, Abdelmoumen Ould Keddour a indiquéà la presse lors d’une visite de travail à Hassi R’mel que "l’objectif est de maintenir la production de 190 millions m3 pour les dix années à venir". En effet, le champ gazier de Hassi R’mel représente 60% de la production globale de gaz en Algérie avec une capacité de production oscillant entre 190 et 210 millions de mètres cubes par jour. Par ailleurs, le patron de la plus grande entreprise du continent a fait remarquer que Sonatrach avait besoin de procéder à des investissements dans les installations de compression du champ pour maintenir cette production. " C’est un projet stratégique pour nous, nous devons nous assurer qu’il sera opérationnel en 2020" , a soutenu Ould Keddour, affirmant que "les retards sont inacceptables". Le P-dg de Sonatrach a affirmé que l'élaboration de la nouvelle stratégie de ce groupe pétrolier à l’horizon 2030 pourrait être finalisée avant la fin de l’année 2017. "Nous sommes en train de travailler sur une nouvelle stratégie de Sonatrach à l’horizon 2030, et j’espère voir finalisée avant la fin de l’année 2017", a-t-il expliqué. Rappelons que le Groupe a entamé l'élaboration d'une nouvelle stratégie à l'horizon 2030, intitulée "projet SH2030". Selon le premier responsable de la compagnie, "il s'agira de définir ce que Sonatrach va devenir, comment et avec quels moyens et organisation va-t-elle y parvenir". "Nous voulons développer la stratégie d'ici l'horizon 2030 pour pouvoir savoir où nous voulons aller, est-ce que nous allons transformer Sonatrach, est-ce que nous ferons aussi du solaire ou bien d'autres activités. Nous allons définir la vision et développer les objectifs. Et à partir de ces objectifs, il s'agira de définir les moyens nécessaires à mettre en œuvre pour les mener à l'horizon 2030", avait-il fait remarquer.

posts.text:
Mersin'de üç tır çarpıştı: 1 ölü, 1 yaralı 07 Kasım 2017 Salı, 12:26 
MERSİN(AA) - Mersin'in Tarsus ilçesinde üç tırın karıştığı kazada baba öldü, oğlu ise yaralandı. 
Mustafa Kuzu (43) idaresindeki 61 K 11782 plakalı tır, Pozantı-Tarsus-Mersin otoyolu Çukurbağ mevkisinde aynı yönde giden Mehmet Emin Çınar yönetimindeki 42 AEJ 05 plakalı tıra arkadan çarptı. 
Çarpışmanın etkisiyle kontrolden çıkan her iki araç, emniyet şeridinde arıza nedeniyle park halinde bulunan 31 VH 046 plakalı tıra çarptı. 
Kazada araç içerisinde sıkışan sürücü Mustafa Kuzu yaşamını yitirdi, yanında bulunan oğlu Mehmet Kuzu (18) ise yaralandı. 
Bir süre trafiğe kapalı kalan otoyol araçların kaldırılmasının ardından yeniden açıldı. İLGİLİ HABERLER

posts.title: Judoda uluslararası görev
posts.text:
Judoda uluslararası görev 07 Kasım 2017 Salı, 12:26 
ANKARA (AA) - Judo Federasyonu Yönetim Kurulu üyesi Kaya Gezeker ile genel koordinatör Mesut Kapan, Uluslararası Judo Federasyonunda (IJF) görevlendirildi. 
Türkiye Judo Federasyonundan yapılan açıklamaya göre, IJF Başkanı Marius Vizer tarafından yapılan görevlendirmede, federasyon dış ilişkiler sorumlusu Gezeker, IJF Polis ve Asker Komisyonuna, genel koordinatör Kapan ise gelişim komisyonu üyeliklerine atandı. 
Türkiye Judo Federasyonunun yeni görevlendirmelerle uluslararası federasyonlarda görevli üye sayısı da dörde çıkmış oldu. 
Metin Özkan, Avrupa Judo Birliği (EJU) Hakem Komitesi, Turgay Demiray da EJU Sağlık Kurulu üyesi olarak görev yapıyor. İLGİLİ HABERLER

posts.author: 金果果
posts.title: 刚结婚就想着生宝宝？这份超全备孕攻略你该收下！
posts.text:
许多10月刚结婚的新娘就会问小犀姐
我大约什么时候准备怀孕比较好？
备孕的时候我要注意什么？
我避孕药刚停没多久会对备孕有影响吗？
等等等等慢慢来
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105416.png (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
怀孕有没有最佳时间段？
一般大家喜欢挑在5月和10月举行婚礼，然后很多人就会立马进入备孕阶段，但其实怀孕的最佳季节是有说法的。
5月结婚
5月结婚的新人们可以选择在夏末秋初进行备孕 ，约7月下旬到9月上旬近两个月的时间。
这种说法的根据是恰好能够妊娠反应时恰好在9、10月，丰收的好时节，胃口不好想挑点刁钻的东西吃老公也能轻松找到。
而遭遇严寒的冬季和传染病毒超多的春天时，胎龄也已经过了三个月的致畸敏感期。预产期还在次年5月之后，天气温和，简直不要太完美。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105411.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
10月结婚
很多10月的新娘可能觉得等到次年7月时间太长了，还可以选择在春末备孕 ，就是明年3、4月的时候，日照充足，环境适宜。
此时气候温和适宜，传染病高发期也已经过去。日照充足还十分充足，是春末怀孕的一大好处~
有利的天时不仅使孕妇感到愉悦，而且使各种营养素都得到充分的保证。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105408.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
而不论是严冬或是早春，都有非常大的弊端。
早春是传染病的高发季节，容易造成胎儿的畸变或是早产的情况出现。
而冬天的室内空气不流通，指数一旦超标也对婴儿较为不利，所以冬季怀孕的胎儿出生缺陷明显高于其他季节，出生缺陷率为 7.9% 。
但是要恰好在这几个月中怀上宝宝实在太难了，所以怀孕的季节理想与否并不是绝对的。
即使不在最佳季节怀孕，但只要注意改善不利条件和注意弥补不足，迎接你的绝对是个健康白胖的宝宝。
受孕时有哪些忌讳？
准备怀孕的时候，千万别急着怀。很多事情需要通过等待才能够迎来最好的结果。
1、 有一点是经常被新人们忽视的--疲劳状态下不要备孕。 这也是很多人问小犀姐，能不能结完婚就备孕？
千万不要。因为结婚前后夫妻双方都会处于非常疲劳的状态，这个时候精子和卵子的质量就会下降，容易引起先兆性流产的情况产生。
当然说到疲劳，出差加班在备孕的那段时间里还是能少则少，保证夫妻双方的身体状况也很重要。
2、 夫妻双方任何一方有烟酒习惯 的需要戒烟戒酒等待6个月。
3、照射X射线、放射线治疗、服用病毒性感冒药物或者慢性疾病用药后需等待3个月。
4、 口服或者埋植避孕药 同样也需要三个月的缓冲期才能够准备受孕。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105402.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
在受孕前还可以进行孕前检查，具体检查什么？前段时间小犀姐已经做过整理了。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105400.png (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
从备孕开始，你就需要进行准备，这样可以尽快怀孕或是为孩子的健康进行打算。
而其实在怀孕之后，身上还会发生很多变化，大都是不怎么舒服的，所以你需要提前做好准备和对策来应对这10个月。
备孕时准备什么？
1、做一张排卵周期表
排卵日身体的雌激素分泌达到最高，可以增加一定的受孕几率。 根据下回的月经日往前推算14天就是排卵日，但是很多人总是连姨妈的日子都会搞乱，可以专门做一张表格来记录自己的排卵周期。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105355.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
也可以去药店买专门的排卵测试纸进行测试结果更加准确一些，但是注意不可使用晨尿，因为经过一夜的积累，尿液中所含LH不能代表实际的值，一般在姨妈结束一周后进行测试。
当出现两条有色条带且检测线等于或深于对照线的显色。表明已出现LH峰值，将在24-48小时内排卵。
2、口服维生素或者叶酸
可以在孕前三个月就开始补充叶酸 ，因为与常人相比，孕妇对叶酸的需求量更高。
婴儿在母体内中发育时，其大脑及神经系统等发育较快，需要大量叶酸，如果在孕早期叶酸不足，容易出现胎儿神经管畸形的情况。
3、适当运动
首先需要适量减少工作，让自己有一个轻松的心情。很多孕妈在孕期不敢做大动作，生怕会伤着孩子。
但 其实可以尝试练习瑜伽或是一些较为舒缓的运动 ，既可以放松心情，又能够锻炼身体，对孩子反而会有好处。
如果孕前本来就身子骨比较弱，也不怎么运动，可以刚开始选择从散步开始，突然加量做剧烈运动这种是绝对不可取的。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105413.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
学会迎接孕期的变化
1、身体外在的变化
在怀孕之后，除了会有传闻中长高几厘米这种好现象的出现，由于体内激素的变化其实身体还会有些不好的现象出现。
孕妇头发会出现打卷、脱落等现象。 还有很多宝妈反应怀孕那几个月脸上 长了许多痘痘和斑点 ，这个时候爱美也顾不上，因为祛斑产品这些都还不能用，可以在生育后几个月再去看医生。
另外还需要为怀孕准备好大两个罩杯的内衣和大一号的鞋子，因为 怀孕时胸会出现肿胀情况 ，平胸妹子来一次痛苦的翻身把！而脚因为体内积水变大，很有可能是永久性的。
一半以上的孕妇还会出现妊娠期牙龈炎 ，所以换上软毛真的很有必要，还需要怀孕期间至少见一次牙医，进行专业的牙齿清洁。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107105351.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 10:56 上传
2、身体内在的变化
“一孕傻三年”不是说的玩玩而已，确实在怀孕期间 孕妇的大脑会有轻度收缩 ，直至孩子出生才会恢复到原来的大小。
所以有什么比较困难的事情就让老公去做吧~
怀孕还容易引起消化不良 ，这都是因为消化速度变慢引起的，但是食物在消化道中停留的时间越长，胎儿吸收的营养就越多。
孕妇可以尽量避免吃油腻或者酸辣的食物，把三顿饭拆成6小顿来吃，这样可能自身可以舒服一些。

posts.author: erzurumflas.com
posts.title: BASKİ, bin 755 kilometre hat döşedi
posts.text:
Balıkesir Büyükşehir Belediyesi iştiraki olan Balıkesir Su ve Kanalizasyon İdaresi (BASKİ) Genel Müdürlüğü kuruluşundan Kasım 2017 tarihine kadar merkez ve kırsal yerleşimlerde mevcut su ve kanalizasyon hatlarını yenilerken, yeni hatlar da döşedi.
BASKİ üç yılda bin 112 kilometre içme suyu ve 643 kilometre kanalizasyon hattı olmak üzere toplam bin 755 kilometre hat döşedi. Yapılan kanalizasyon ve içme suyu hatlarının toplam uzunluğu Balıkesir- Van arası karayolu uzunluğundan fazla olduğu bildirildi. BASKİ’nin kuruluşundan sonra yapılan kanalizasyon ve içme suyu hatlarının uzunluğu, mevcut hatların toplam uzunluğunun yüzde 13.3’ü olduğu açıklandı.

thread.title: 3 Reasons To Be Bullish On Intel Corporation Stock Over Other Chipmakers
thread.title_full: 3 Reasons To Be Bullish On Intel Corporation Stock Over Other Chipmakers

posts.author: Tom Taulli
posts.title: 3 Reasons To Be Bullish On Intel Corporation Stock Over Other Chipmakers
posts.text:
Stocks surge to record highs amid increased M&A activity >>> READ MORE 
Breaking news sponsored by Home > Stock Picks > Stocks to Buy > 3 Reasons To Be Bullish On Intel Corporation Stock Over Other Chipmakers Broadcom’s massive deal for Qualcomm shows there is lots of value with old-line chip operators like INTC By Tom Taulli , InvestorPlace Writer & IPO Playbook Editor | Nov 7, 2017, 4:30 am EST Source: Shutterstock View All Posts 
After years being stuck in neutral, Intel Corporation (NASDAQ: INTC ) is finally showing signs of life. Since August, INTC stock price has gone from $35 to $46. 
Then again, there has been some positive Intel news lately. Just look at the earnings report . The company’s profits came to $1.01 per share and revenues hit $16.2 billion. The Street was looking for earnings of only 80 cents a share and revenues of $15.7 billion. 
The outlook was also robust, with full-year earnings forecast at $3.25 per share and revenues of $62 billion. As for the analysts’ consensus, it was for $3.00 per share and revenues of $61.3 billion. 
Now it’s true that INTC is not without its issues. The company still must fight against tough rivals like NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA ) and Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMD ). What’s more, the core PC business — which accounts for 55% of revenues — is in a secular decline. 
Yet despite all this, INTC stock still looks like an attractive opportunity for investors. Here are three reasons why. Intel Has Compelling Mission 
Mission statements can often be a joke. Let’s face it, many companies only give lip service to them. 
But this does not appear to be the case with INTC. The fact is that CEO Brian Krzanich has set forth a compelling mission — that is, for the company to be the driving force in the data revolution. And, more importantly, he has been taking steps to realize this. 
There is, for example, the bold $15.3 billion acquisition of Mobileye, which is a leader in automotive technologies. The company’s chips have been implemented in over 15 million vehicles. Mobileye also has a partnership with BMW to launch self-driving cars by 2021. 
But INTC’s internal R&D has also been prolific. Keep in mind that the company has seen growth in key areas like 5G, memory and the Internet of Things (IoT). 
And yes, INTC is already seeing the results of these efforts. In the latest quarter, the revenues for the cloud business jumped 24% and the IoT segment saw a 23% increase. INTC Has Powerful Competitive Advantages 
While the growth profile for the PC market is lackluster, there are still some key benefits. Note that the business is a source of substantial cash flows, as INTC continues to realize efficiencies from the economies of scale (in the latest quarter, the segment posted an 8% increase in operating income ). The result is that INTC has the resources to expand aggressively into other markets.

thread.title_full: Des Marocains menacent de fuir vers l’Algérie

posts.author: Samih. B. / version française: Moussa. K.
posts.title: Des Marocains menacent de fuir vers l’Algérie
posts.text:
Des Marocains menacent de fuir vers l’Algérie 2017/11/07 0 Samih. B. / version française: Moussa. K. 
La région est du Royaume marocain a été le théâtre de violentes contestations ces dernières 48 heures suite à la mort samedi dernier d’un citoyen tombé sous les balles du garde-frontière marocain. Apparentés Mahmoud Abbas salue le soutien « indéfectible » de l’Algérie à la cause Palestinienne Les funérailles dudit citoyen dans le village Beni Drar ont tournéà une vague de contestation qui s’est répandue aux régions frontalières et aux villages d’Ahfir pour s’étendre à la capitale de l’est marocain, en l’occurrence Ouedjda. Selon la presse marocaine, la victime dénommée Amar Salhi, 48 ans, a été tué samedi à 22 heures par deux balles des garde-frontières marocains dans la 34e RM près du Douar Ould Salah relevant de la localité Beni Drar. La victime aurait franchi la frontière séparant les deux pays avant d’être aperçu par les garde-frontières algériens déployés sur le tracé frontalier. Après avoir réussi à trompé la vigilance des soldats algériens, Amar Salhi a tenté d’escalader la muraille de barbelés dressée par le Maroc à sa frontière avec l’Algérie avant d’entrer dans l’altercation avec les garde-frontières. Du coup, ces derniers lui ont tiré dessus. Les contestations se sont exacerbées lorsque les forces de sécurité marocaines ont décliné toute responsabilité dans le décès dudit quadragénaire. D’ailleurs, des médias proches de El Makhzen ont indiqué que la victime était au moment des faits sous l’emprise de la drogue. Notons que d’importants renforts de la Gendarmerie nationale et de la garde-frontière étaient déployés le long du tracé frontalier, surtout que des manifestants marocains ont menacé de fuir vers l’Algérie d’autant plus que l’étau se resserre davantage autour de leur source de survie, à savoir la contrebande.

posts.author: renato farias (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Governo divulga a contrataĂ§ĂŁo de 54 mil novas moradias do Minha Casa Minha Vida
posts.text:
O Governo do Brasil praticamente atinge a meta estabelecida para este ano estimada em 100 mil unidades habitacionais com autorizaĂ§ĂŁo para contrataĂ§ĂŁo Empresas terĂŁo 30 dias para comprovar informaĂ§Ăľes  preenchidas em formulĂĄrios. Ichiro Guerra/PR O MinistĂŠrio das Cidades autorizou a contrataĂ§ĂŁo de mais 54 mil unidades habitacionais destinadas a Faixa 1 do programa Minha Casa Minha Vida. Os imĂłveis poderĂŁo ser adquiridos a partir dos recursos do Fundo de Arrendamento Residencial (FAR). A proposta foi publicada no DiĂĄrio Oficial da UniĂŁo nesta segunda-feira (6) e jĂĄ estĂĄ em vigor. 
A lista das propostas contempla projetos nas cinco regiĂľes do PaĂs, a maior parte no Sudeste. Antes da efetiva contrataĂ§ĂŁo, um cronograma para cadastramento das propostas e anĂĄlise da Caixa EconĂ´mica Federal deve ser seguido pelas empresas.  
Os proponentes terĂŁo 30 dias para comprovar informaĂ§Ăľes preenchidas nos FormulĂĄrios de QualificaĂ§ĂŁo Inicial, 90 dias para apresentar anteprojeto e estudo de viabilidade do empreendimento e 180 dias para reunir todas as condiĂ§Ăľes necessĂĄrias Ă contrataĂ§ĂŁo do empreendimento. 
As novas contrataĂ§Ăľes fazem parte do segundo lote de moradias do Minha Casa Minha Vida e beneficiarĂĄ famĂlias com renda mensal de atĂŠ R$ 1,8 mil. De acordo com o MinistĂŠrio das Cidades, a medida permite que o Governo do Brasil cumpra com a meta estabelecida para o ano, com 100 mil unidades habitacionais autorizadas para contrataĂ§ĂŁo.  
Fonte: Governo do Brasil, com informaĂ§Ăľes do DiĂĄrio Oficial da UniĂŁo e MinistĂŠrio das Cidades http://www.phbemnota.com

posts.text:
Ankerit 

Benannt wurde das Mineral nach dem österreichischen Mineralogen M.J.Anker. Es bildet sich in hydrothermalen Lösungen, durch Metamorphose, ist aber auch in Sedimenten zu finden. 

Meist rhomboedrische Kristalle oder dichte Massen. Frisch sieht das Mineral gelblichweiß aus ist aber oft durch Oxydatation des Fe bzw. Mn braun/bräunlich. (Braunspat) 
Verwendung findet Ankerit in der Hüttenindustrie. Eigenständige Bedeutung gering gelegentlich als Erzzuschlag.

posts.author: Berita
posts.title: Tidak salah bukan Islam tumpang di surau masa bah
posts.text:
Tidak salah bukan Islam tumpang di surau masa bah   
Beberapa mangsa banjir teruk di sekitar Lengkuk P Ramlee berteduh di surau Taman Free School, George Town, 5 November 2017. KUALA LUMPUR, 7 Nov ― Tidak salah bukan Islam masuk berteduh di rumah ibadat Islam ketika berdepan musibah banjir, kata ustaz Wan Ji Wan Hussin. 
“Dalam hadis ada menyebut bahawa pada zaman Nabi, ada seorang orang bukan Islam bernama Sumamah bin Usal dibawa oleh Nabi ke dalam masjid. 
“Akhirnya, Sumamah bin Usal itu peluk agama Islam. Hadis ini menjadi dalil bahawa bukan Muslim tidak salah masuk dalam masjid,” katanya di Facebook. 
Beliau mengulas kritikan terhadap bilal surau Taman Free School, George Town yang mengizinkan 70 bukan Islam menumpang ketika bah Ahad lalu. 
Wan Ji, kini pegawai penerangan Pejabat Ketua Menteri Pulau Pinang, berkata Islam dan bukan Islam di negeri itu “saling meringankan beban sesama kami”. 
Foto mangsa banjir bukan Islam yang berteduh dalam ruang solat surau terbabit menarik perhatian ramai di media sosial sejak Ahad. 
“Atas dasar kemanusiaan dan mahu menyelamatkan nyawa, saya tidak kisah apa orang hendak kata,” kata bilal Sapno Tukijo, 50, seperti dilaporkan media. 
Kira-kira 70 orang termasuk Cina dan India sekitar Lengkuk P Ramlee yang menjadi mangsa banjir berteduh di surau berkenaan kelmarin. 
Tambahnya, penduduk bukan Islam itu asalnya mahu menumpang sementara di sebuah tokong berhampiran namun gagal ke sana kerana arus deras.

posts.title: 이중생활 재밌을 듯!!!
posts.text:
이번에 SNS 통해서
CL , 태양 , 오혁이 나오는 이중생활이라는
프로그램 티저 영상을 봤는데 진짜 재밌을 듯 !
CL 완전 팬인데 요즘 한국 프로그램이나
한국 행사에서 보기 많이 힘들어져서
아쉬웠는데 ㅠ . ㅠ
리얼리티 프로그램이라니 !!
​
​
CL 은 여자가 봐도 당당하고 자기 멋을 부릴 줄 아는 그런 여자 ?
느낌이라 진짜 그냥 좋더라구요
또 독특한 음악이나 퍼포먼스로 대중을 사로잡은 가수의
백스테이지 오프 더 레코드라니 ..
진짜 넘 기대되서미치겠어요
​
​
그리고 항상 느끼는 거지만 CL 의 메이크업은
강렬한 느낌이고 제가 도전해보지 못할 만한 스타일이라
항상 어떻게 화장을 하나 궁금했었는데
이렇게 이중생활에서 낱낱이 보여준다고 하니
더 기대되는 것 같아요 !
​
​
대한민국 대표 걸크러쉬 뮤지션 CL!
미국으로 가고 나서 한동안 한국에서 볼 수 없어
너무 아쉬웠는데 이중생활에서 미국에서의 생활 이야기와
그녀의 색다른 일상생활을 볼 수 있으니
이중생활은 더 흥미로운 프로그램인 것 같아요 !
​
​
제가 좋아하는 CL 말고도
이중생활에는 말없기로 유명한 오혁도 나오네요 ㅋㅋㅋ
오혁 이 티저장명 보고 혼자 빵 터졋네요 !
매니저인지 친구인지 첫 촬영인데 기분 어떠냐고 세번이나 물어보는데
세번 다 묵묵부답
역시 오혁 b
​
​
그리고 빅뱅의 태양 !
태양은 예능에 많이 안나오는 사람인지라
기대감도 크더라구요 !
전에 나혼자산다에 나온거 보고 친근감이
막 느껴지긴 했는데 ㅋㅋㅋ
이번에 이중생활에서는 어떤 모습으로
친근한 모습을 보여줄지
너무 기대되요 ㅋㅋㅋ
이중생활 11 월 23 일 목요일
밤 10 시 50 분에 첫 방송 한다고 하니
목요일은 안자고 눈에 불을켜고 기다려야겠어요 ㅋㅋ

thread.title_full: Německo tratí na daních miliardy eur. Mizí i díky sousedům

posts.title: Německo tratí na daních miliardy eur. Mizí i díky sousedům
posts.text:
Německo tratí na daních miliardy eur. Mizí i díky sousedům AKTUALITA 7. 11. 2017 09:48 - Aktuality autor: šar Německo přichází kvůli daňovým rájům ročně o 17 miliard eur (435 miliard korun) a Evropská unie jako celek o zhruba 60 miliard eur (1,5 bilionu korun). Napsal to v úterý deník Süddeutsche Zeitung s odvoláním na výpočty francouzského ekonoma Gabriela Zucmana, který působí na univerzitě v kalifornském Berkeley. diskuze: 0 Ilustrační snímek, zdroj: ThinkStock 
Fungování daňových rájů odhalují v těchto dnech dokumenty nazvané Paradise Papers, o nichž informují světová média. Více než 13 milionů dokumentů ukazuje například způsob, jakým se za pomoci daňových rájů firmy jako Apple, Nike či Uber snaží vyhýbat placení daní. 
Evropské země kvůli daňovým rájům na firemních daních ročně tratí desítky miliard eur. Nebýt daňových rájů, zvýšil by se podle ekonoma Zucmana výnos s firemních daní v Německu o 32,2 procenta, ve Francii o 24,7 procenta, v Maďarsku o 23,3 procenta a v Itálii o 21,4 procenta. Relativně málo na daňových rájích tratí Česká republika, u níž by se bez nich výnos z firemních daní zvýšil o 5,8 procenta. 
Zajímavé je, že třeba Německo o největší část ušlých peněz nepřichází kvůli daňovým rájům v Karibiku, ale kvůli dalším zemím Evropské unie jako je Lucembursko, Irsko nebo Nizozemsko. 
Zucman systém daňových rájů kritizuje, protože podle něj posiluje nerovnost ve světě. Často složité daňové operace, které pomáhají vyhnout se placení daní, si totiž mohou dovolit jen bohatí. Peníze, které takto uniknou, si pak podle něj státy musí opatřit jinde - typicky u obyčejných zaměstnanců. Související články Bleskovky 10:10 Lobbista Roman Janoušek požádal Krajský soud v Brně o delší přerušení trestu za sražení ženy automobilem. Důvody jsou zdravotní. Přerušení trestu mělo skončit 25. listopadu. Krajský soud v Brně rozhodne pravděpodobně ve čtrnáctidenní lhůtě, oznámila v úterý novinářům mluvčí Krajského soudu v Brně Eva Sigmundová. 9:59 Studio soukromé televizní stanice v afghánské metropoli Kábulu se v úterý stalo terčem útoku. Do budovy po výbuchu vnikli nejméně dva ozbrojenci, informovala agentura Reuters. Zprávy o případných obětech zatím nejsou. 9:31 Ve věku 80 let zemřel zpěvák Karel Štědrý. P atřil k hlavním představitelům éry české populární hudby 60. let. Působil v Redutě, Semaforu či Rokoku, věnoval se i herectví. 9:20 Bývalý volební poradce nynějšího amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa Carter Page se v loňském roce během svých dvou cest do Moskvy dvakrát potkal s ruským vicepremiérem Arkadijem Dvorkovičem, ač dříve setkání s vysokými činiteli ruské vlády popíral. Vyplývá to podle Reuters ze zveřejněného Pageova svědectví před výborem Sněmovny reprezentantů pro kontrolu tajných služeb. 9:09 ODS nepostaví do prezidentské volby svého kandidáta. Prvořadým cílem druhé nejsilnější sněmovní strany je to, aby nebyla opět zvolen Miloš Zeman. Svého bývalého předsedu a někdejšího premiéra Mirka Topolánka pokládá ODS za kandidáta , který by byl schopen čelit nebezpečí paktu mezi Zemanem a předsedou vítězného hnutí ANO Andrejem Babišem, řekl předseda ODS Petr Fiala. 6. 11. 19:46 Pachatel nedělního masakru v Texasu před činem poslal své tchyni několik výhružných textových zpráv. Na útěku pak telefonoval svému otci, že byl postřelen. "V té rodině došlo ke konfliktu," informoval mluvčí texaské policie Freeman Martin s tím, že tchyně kostel, ve kterém se střílelo, čas od času navštěvovala. Šestadvacetiletý střelec, který zabil 26 lidí a 20 jich zranil, se pokusil z místa činu uprchnout. Pronásledovali ho ale ozbrojení svědci, s nimiž se dostal do přestřelky. V následné automobilové honičce havaroval a podlehl střelnému zranění. 6. 11. 19:21 Orkán Herwart poškodil podle odhadů Lesní ochranné služby (LOS) 2,4 milionu metrů krychlových dřevní hmoty. To jsou zhruba tři miliony vzrostlých stromů a zhruba 15 procent celkové roční těžby dřeva v Česku. Uvedl to Jan Liška z LOS, která patří pod Výzkumný ústav lesního hospodářství a myslivosti. Většinou jsou přitom první následky větrných kalamit podhodnocené, mohou proto stoupnout až na tři miliony metrů krychlových. Finanční přepočet na škody bude v řádu miliard korun. Například orkán Kyrill před desetiletím v lednu 2007 poškodil v Česku celkem 8,84 milionu metrů krychlových dřeva. 6. 11. 18:59 Zamýšlené zvýšení penze, které by chtělo co nejdříve prosadit hnutí ANO a jeho předseda Andrej Babiš , by bylo zřejmě nevýhodné pro zhruba tři pětiny seniorů a seniorek v Česku. Vyplatilo by se teď nejspíš jen lidem, kteří mají důchod nižší než 11 200 korun. Vyplývá to z propočtů ČTK, které vycházejí ze statistických údajů důchodové ročenky a České správy sociálního zabezpečení (ČSSZ). 6. 11. 18:35 Připomínkami už odsouhlasených či nyní projednávaných kroků, které mají ztížit možnosti daňových úniků, reagovali zástupci evropských institucí i členských zemí EU na novou obsáhlou sérii publikovaných dokumentů o daňových rájích . Místopředseda Evropské komise pro euro a finanční stabilitu Valdis Dombrovskis uvedl, že nejnovější odhalení dodávají další význam trvající unijní snaze. 6. 11. 18:19 Saúdské finanční domy začaly na příkaz centrální banky zmrazovat účty osob, které byly v Saúdské Arábii zadrženy pro podezření z korupce. Na příkaz nově založeného protikorupčního výboru byly o víkendu zadrženy desítky lidí včetně jedenácti princů a několika desítek současných i bývalých ministrů. 6. 11. 17:49 Americké velvyslanectví v Turecku začalo v omezené míře znovu vydávat víza tureckým občanům. Ankara podle zdroje z turecké vlády zřejmě učiní obdobný krok jako Washington, uvedla v pondělí agentura Reuters. 6. 11. 17:30 Do texaského kostela, kde v neděli zabil střelec 26 lidí , chodili příbuzní útočníkovy ženy. Televizi CNN to dnes řekl místní šerif, podle něhož ale tito lidé nebyli uvnitř v době masakru. 6. 11. 16:55 Hnutí Svoboda a přímá demokracie nepostaví stranického kandidáta do prezidentské volby. Po jednání s prezidentem Milošem Zemanem na zámku v Lánech to řekl předseda hnutí Tomio Okamura. Zástupci SPD se prý shodli se Zemanem na tom, že by Česko neměl dlouhodobě vést kabinet bez důvěry. Okamura rovněž zopakoval, že hnutí nemůže podpořit menšinový kabinet, který skládá Andrej Babiš. 6. 11. 16:20 Piráti svolávají zástupce všech stran sněmovny vyjma hnutí ANO, aby se domluvili na obsazení výborů. Vadí jim, že ANO vedené Andrejem Babišem, který je podezřelý z podvodu v dotační kauze, chce mandátový a imunitní výbor. Jednání má být neformálním setkáním u kulatého stolu. 6. 11. 16:06 Lobbista Marek Dalík nastoupil do vězení. Odsouzen byl k pěti letům vězení v souvislosti s podvodem při nákupu obrněnců Pandur pro armádu. Proti verdiktu si podal dovolání k Nejvyššímu soudu, to však na jeho povinnost dostavit se do věznice nemělo vliv. 6. 11. 15:42 Více než 15 tisíc klientů podalo v pondělí prostřednictvím americké právní kanceláře u soudu v německém Braunschweigu žalobu na koncern Volkswagen. Dožadují se v ní vrácení peněz za auta se softwarem, který sloužil k manipulaci s emisemi. Kvůli skandálu vede Volkswagen v Německu řadu právních sporů. 6. 11. 15:30 Z lidí, kteří se chtějí v lednu příštího roku zúčastnit prezidentských voleb, by 34 procent dalo hlas současnému prezidentu Miloši Zemanovi . Na druhém místě je s 22 procenty bývalý předseda Akademie věd Jiří Drahoš. Textaře Michala Horáčka by volilo 13 procent občanů, další kandidáti zatím oslovili jen zlomek veřejnosti. Velká část potenciálních voličů - zhruba pětina - ale ještě neví, koho by vybrala. K volbám chce přijít 66 procent oprávněných voličů. 6. 11. 15:10 Prezident Miloš Zeman přijal v pondělí odpoledne na lánském zámku zástupce hnutí Svoboda a přímá demokracie. Předseda hnutí Tomio Okamura při příchodu na setkání novinářům řekl, že očekává debatu o výsledcích voleb, nové vládě a povolebním uspořádání i o prezidentské volbě. 6. 11. 15:01 Střelec, který v neděli zabil v texaském kostele 26 lidí, spáchal sebevraždu poté, co jeho ujíždějící vůz pronásledovali dva místní obyvatelé. Řekl to v pondělí místní šerif v rozhovoru s televizí CBS News. Mezi oběťmi krveprolití bylo nejméně osm členů jedné rodiny, uvedla stanice CNN. 6. 11. 14:50 Jihlavská náměstkyně primátora Jana Mayerová z hnutí ANO bude funkci vykonávat jako neuvolněný politik. Na funkci nerezignovala, ačkoli to minulý týden avizovala. Mayerová patří mezi obviněné v kauze dotací na farmu Čapí hnízdo . O změně jejího postavení ve vedení radnice v pondělí rozhodlo městské zastupitelstvo, z něhož se Mayerová omluvila. Primátor Rudolf Chloupek (ČSSD) změnu zdůvodnil tím, že je Mayerová dlouhodobě nemocná.

posts.author: Berita
posts.title: Pelakon dicekup kes ganja yakin tidak salah, kesal percaya kawan
posts.text:
Pelakon dicekup kes ganja yakin tidak salah, kesal percaya kawan   
Nadzmi berkata dia yakin tidak bersalah kerana dibebaskan polis tidak sampai 24 jam. — Foto ihsan Instagram/Nadzmi KUALA LUMPUR, 7 Nov — Pelakon Nadzmi Adhwa mengakui dirinya antara individu yang ditahan polis atas dakwaan memiliki ganja minggu lalu. 
Nadzmi, 25, berkata penahanan itu angkara terlalu mempercayai rakan yang sudah lama berada di bawah pemerhatian polis kerana memiliki dadah. 
“Nasib tidak menyebelahi saya apabila pihak berkuasa menahan saya sewaktu berada bersamanya. 
“Kesilapan saya adalah terlalu mempercayai teman dan terpengaruh. 
“Bagaimanapun peristiwa ditahan pihak berkuasa banyak memberikan pengajaran kepada saya agar lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih kawan,” katanya kepada mStar Online . 
Media semalam melaporkan seorang pelakon ditahan minggu lalu selepas polis menemui ganja dalam keretanya. 
Ganja dalam tin dilapor disembunyikan di tempat duduk pemandu ketika pemeriksaan polis di sebuah stesen minyak sekitar jam 1.30 pagi. 
Pelakon drama Hati Perempuan berkata dia yakin tidak bersalah kerana dibebaskan polis tidak sampai 24 jam. 
“Saya yakin tidak bersalah dalam hal ini dan telah pun dibebaskan tidak sampai 24 jam selepas ditahan,” dia dilaporkan berkata.

posts.title: „Văduva Neagră”, condamnată la moarte. Cum și-a ucis soțul și iubiții
posts.text:
„Văduva Neagră”, condamnată la moarte. Cum și-a ucis soțul și iubiții „Văduva Neagră”, condamnată la moarte. Cum și-a ucis soțul și iubiții 
Un tribunal din Japonia a condamnat-o la moarte prin spânzurare pe Chisako Kakehi, în vârstă de 70 de ani, cunoscută opiniei publice nipone ca „Văduva Neagră”. Bătrâna a fost găsită vinovată de moartea a trei bărbați, unul dintre ei fiind un fost soț, și tentativa de ucidere a unui al patrulea bărbat. 
Chisako Kakehi 
Verdictul dat de un tribunalul districtual din Kyoto marchează finalul unui proces care a captat atenția societății din Japonia prin ițele de thriller ale cazului. 
Kakehi și-a primit porecla de „Văduva Neagră” pornind de la asemănările dintre felul în care își omoară păianjenul din specia Latrodectus insectele prinse în pânza lui și modul în care femeia și-a ucis victimele, otrăvindu-le cu cianură, relatează The Guardian . 
Chisako Kakehi i-a otrăvit pe cei trei bărbați pentru a le colecta apoi polița de asigurare. 
„Acuzata a determinat victimele – cu intenție criminală în toate cele patru cazuri - să bea un compus din cianură” , a explicat judecătorul Ayako Nakagawa în instanță, potrivit postului public japonez de televiziune NHK. 
Judecătorul a respins argumentele avocaților apărării, și anume că bătrâna nu este răspunzătoare penal pentru faptele ei, deoarece suferă de demență. 
Procurorii susțin că femeia i-a omorât pe cei trei bărbați după ce aceștia au făcut-o beneficară a poliței lor de asigurare. În ultimul deceniu, Kakehi ar fi strâns de pe urma asigurării 8,8 milioane de dolari, dar a pierdut o mare parte din această sumă în diverse tranzacții financiare nereușite. 
Chisako Kakehi a avut relații cu mulți bărbați, majoritatea bătrâni sau cu o stare precară de sănătate, pe care i-a întâlnit prin agenții de dating, criteriul de selecție fiind statutul lor financiar. De asemenea, un alt aspect important: ca bărbații vizați să nu aibă copii. 
Procesul „Văduvei Negre” a început la sfârșitul lunii iunie. La una dintre înfățișări în fața instanței, Kakehi a declarat judecătorilor: „Dacă mă vor executa mâine, voi muri zâmbind” . 
Avocații bătrânei intenționează să depună contestație la o instanță superioară.

thread.title: Ini Nih Bukti Pembalakan Liar di Kalbar Masih Marak | Pro Kalbar
thread.title_full: Ini Nih Bukti Pembalakan Liar di Kalbar Masih Marak | Pro Kalbar

posts.title: Ini Nih Bukti Pembalakan Liar di Kalbar Masih Marak | Pro Kalbar
posts.text:
Selasa, 07 November 2017 16:12 Ini Nih Bukti Pembalakan Liar di Kalbar Masih Marak Tweet PERIKSA DOKUMEN. Tim memeriksa kelengkapan dokumen Sawmill pengolahan kayu "Harmonis" di Jalan Lintas Sintang, Simpang Empat Kayu Lapis, Dusun Gonis Butun, Desa Gonis Tekam, Kecamatan Sekadau Hilir, Kabupaten Sekadau, Rabu (1/11).SPORC for Rakyat Kalbar 
PROKAL.CO , PONTIANAK- Kata siapa pembalakan hutan di Kalbar sudah tak ada? Buktinya, pihak berwenang kembali mengamankan kayu tanpa dokumen sah, Rabu (1/11) lalu. Penindakan pembalakan liar itu dilakukan Satuan Polhut Reaksi Cepat (SPORC) Brigade Bekantan dari Balai Pengamanan dan Penegakan Hukum Lingkungan Hidup dan Kehutanan (BPPHLHK) Kalimantan Seksi Wilayah III Pontianak. 
Mereka tak sendiri, bersama Korwas Ditkrimsus Polda Kalbar menggerebek Sawmill pengolahan Kayu "Harmonis" di Jalan Lintas Sintang, Simpang 4 Kayu Lapis, Dusun Gonis Butun, RT 003, RW 001, Desa Gonis Tekam, Kecamatan Sekadau Hilir, Kabupaten Sekadau. Sebanyak 3.400 batang atau sekitar 75 meter kubik kayu olahan ilegal disita. Pemilik sawmill berinisial AP, 44 tahun, ditetapkan sebagai tersangka. 
"Barang bukti kayu olahan ilegal dititipkan di Rapbasan Sanggau, sedangkan tersangka AP telah ditahan di Rutan Kelas II Pontianak," kata Kepala Seksi Wilayah III BPPHLHK Wilayah Kalimantan, David Muhammad, kepada para wartawan di markas SPORC, Senin (6/11) seperti diberitakan Rakyat Kalbar. 
Dikatakan David, pengungkapan ini berawal dari laporan masyarakat tentang adanya pengangkutan kayu dari Kabupaten Sintang dibawa menuju sebuah Sawmill di Simpang Kayu Lapis. Rabu (1/11), sekitar pukul 06.00 WIB, tim yang sedang beratroli di Simpang Kayu Lapis menemukan sebuah truk bak berwarna hitam. 
Sesuai dengan informasi masyarakat, truk itu bermuatan kayu dan diparkir di depan sawmill."Setelah pengecekan, ternyata truk tersebut bermuatan kayu jenis Belian berdokumen dari Kabupaten Sintang dengan tujuan Sawmill Harmonis," bebernya. Tim mencurigai sawmill tersebut menampung kayu-kayu ilegal. Petugas kemudian meminta sang pemilik untuk membuka pintu sawmill-nya. Setelah masuk, didalamnya petugas menemukan berbagai jenis kayu. 
"Di sana, dari hasil pemeriksaan tim didapat kurang lebih 3400 batang jenis kayu Bengkirai, keladan, dan rimba campuran, tanpa disertai dokumen angkutan Surat Keterangan Sahnya Hasil Hutan Kayu (SKSHHK) yang sah," terang David. 
Karena tidak bisa menunjukkan dokumen yang sah, makapemilik sawmill dibawa ke markas SPORC Pontianak untuk dilakukan pemeriksaan oleh Pejabat Pegawai Negeri Sipil (PPNS) Gakkum LHK. AP diduga melanggar Pasal 83 ayat 1 huruf b atau pasal 87 ayat 1 atau pasal 87 ayat 1 huruf c, Undang-undang Nomor 18 Tahun 2013 tentang Pencegahan dan Pemberantasan Perusakan Hutan. APterancam hukuman penjara paling singkat satu tahun dan paling lama lima tahun, denda minimal Rp500 juta dan maksimal Rp2,5 miliar. 
"Berdasarkan dua alat bukti yang cukup, maka AP ditetapkan sebagai tersangka. Sementara yang kita kenakan yang terbukti kuat dia menampung (kayu),” ujarnya.Namun, jika nanti dalam penyidikan nanti ternyata sebagai cukong atau pemodal, maka pasal yang dikenakan kepada AP akan lebih berlapis. David menerangkan, penanganan perkara ini juga melibatkan Balai Pengolahan Hutan Produksi (BPHP) Wilayah VIII Pontianak dalam hal pengukuran, saksi ahli, lacak balak, dan audit dokumen yang ada di sawmill tersebut. 
Terhadap kasus ini, selaku petugas yang ditunjuk, penyidik PPNS Gakkum LHK Kalimantan akan terus mengusut keterlibatan pelaku lainnya dalam jaringan pembalakan liar tersebut."Kita akan terus melakukan penyelidikan dan pelacakan adanya kemungkinan pelaku lain terhadap pengumpulan kayu ilegal tersebut,” tegasnya. 
Kayu di dalam truk tersebut setelah dilakukan pemeriksaan statusnya menjadi kayu hasil lelang.Sitaan dari Polres sintang. “Dilelang Kejaksaan Negeri Sintang,” jelas David. 
Pihaknya sedang melakukan pemeriksaan asal 3.400 batang kayu tersebut.Kuat dugaan, kayu tersebut dari perambahan hutan. Selain itu, diduga juga diambil dari proses pembersihan lahan sebelum aktivitas penambangan dimulai (land clearing) perkebunan. "Kemungkinan besar dari perambahan hutan, jika masyarakat memanfaatkan kayu dari land clearing, ini baru dugaan.Nanti kita berkonsultasi dengan BPHP terhadap dugaan seperti itu dan bagaimana penanganan hukumnya," tuturnya. 
Namun yang jelas,kata dia, di sawmill tersebut tidak memiliki dokumen sah yang menyertai untuk kayu. Sementara terkait informasi awal dari masyarakat bahwa memang ada perambahan atau pembalakan hutan di sekitar kawasan hutan lindung di wilayah tersebut, sedang dilacak. "Lacak balak sedang dilakukan, apakah merujuk ke hutan lindung," kata David. 
Beberapa waktu lalu, Polair Polda Kalbar juga mengungkap kasus pembalakan liar. Sekitar 1.000 batang kayu log diamankan. Keadaan ini membuktikan pembalakan liar masih marak di Kalbar. David mengakui, pihaknya kesulitan dalam memberantasan para penjahat lingkungan itu.Dia mengungkapkan, seperti penggerebekan di Singkawang beberapa waktu lalu, masyarakat tidak mengakui memiliki kayu tersebut. 
"Jadi kita tidak bisa meneruskan pengembangan sampai ke pemiliknya itu.Walaupun kita yakin kayu itu berasal dari kawasan hutan, tetapi karena tidak ada masyarakat yang mengakui mungkin karena takut atau bagaimana, makanya kayu itu kita lelang," tandasnya. Masih di Markas SPORC, Kepala Seksi Korwas PPNS dari Direktorat Reserse Kriminal Khusus Polda Kalbar, Kompol A.E Tambunan mengatakan, kehadiran polisi dalam pengungkapan itu untuk membackup SPORC. Setelah mendapatkan informasi dari masyarakat, barang bukti maupun tersangka harus ditemukan. "Jadi kita bantu selama beberapa hari itu akhirnya ketemu," katanya. 
Dijelaskannya, saat penyelidikan di lapangan, ditemukan truk bak hitam dengan kabin berwarna kuning sering mondar mandir mengangkut kayu dari wilayah Sintang maupun Sekadau menuju belakang ruko milik tersangka.Saat akan diperiksa, secara kebetulan sopirnya pergi karena sudah malam. Sampai lah keesokan paginya. 
"Besoknya dicek, memang dokumen lelang, kayu Belian dari kejaksaan Negeri Sintang, tapi informasi yang kita dapat, di belakang itu ada sawmill," paparnya. Kemudian tim masuk kedalam Sawmill tersebut. Mencengangkan, petugas menemukan tumpukan kayu dan meminta pemiliknya untuk menunjukan dokumen perizinan. 
“Bagaimana keabsahannya yang ditunjukkan kepada kita hanya berupa nota," beber Tambunan. Akhirnya,dipanggil lah unsur atau institusi yang berwenang untuk mengaudit surat izin pengolahan kayu tersebut."Karena memang surat yang ditunjukkan kepada kita hanya surat dari kepala desa," ucapnya. 
Tidak bisa menunjukkan dokumen yang sah menjadi alasan menahan pemilik sawmill. Selain itu, masih menunggu hasil penyidikan BPHP selaku pihak berwenang mengaudit perizinan tersebut. Yang diaudit termasuk asal kayu, sehingga kemungkinan dapat dilakukan lacak balak. "Kita tunggu nanti untuk memperkuat, tapi untuk sekarang dugaan sudah ada, sampai saat ini belum menunjukkan dokumen yang sah," beber Tambunan. 
Pemilik sawmil hanya menunjukkan surat izin dari kepala desa dengan alasan masih baru. Sedangkan informasi yang didapatkan pihaknya, sawmil itu tempat menampung kayu. "Kalau dilihat bekas tumpukan serbuk dari ketamannya mungkin sekitar dua atau tiga bulan beroperasi.Kita lihat tiangnya masih baru," ujarnya. 
Dari hasil interogasi si pemilik, kayu ditampungnya sebab masyarakat menjual kayu kepadanya. Namun,alibi ini seperti kasus di Singkawang: kayu sebagai titipan-titipan. Ternyata belakangan tidak ada pihak yang muncul untuk mengakui kayu tersebut miliknya. "Modusnya dia (pemilik sawmill) membeli dari masyarakat, walaupun alasan dia kayu ini titipan untuk diketam. Ini kita tunggu memang, nanti kita lihat sah nggak dia nebang," pungkas Tambunan. 
Di sisi lain, Komandan Brigade SPORC, Hari Novianto menyebut, kerugian negara atas kegiatan ilegal di sawmill tersebut bernilai ratusan juta rupiah."Kalau perkiraan saya, sekitar Rp300 juta dari kayu yang ada di dalam sawmill itu, karena kayu ini jenis kelas II," bebernya. 
Dijelaskannya,sawmill itu notabene berada di sekitar kawasan hutan lindung dan kawasan hutan produksi. Termasuk juga ada aktivitasland clearing dari perkebunan kelapa sawit. Sehingga sangat miris jika hanya mengeluarkansurat keterangan dari desa terhadap keberadaan sawmill itu. Dia menjelaskan, sawmill atau aktivitas pengetaman kayu industri lanjutan harus ada kerja sama terlebih dahulu dengan pihak yang memiliki izin usaha pemegang hak pemanfaatan hasil hutan kayu (primer) atau yang memilik izin tebang.Artinya, kalau tidak ada kerjasama, maka tidak diberikan izin. 
“Mungkin dia pun belum mengajukan izin. Itu yang sangat kita sayangkan kenapa diberikan izin untuk pembelahan pengetaman, walaupun itu sawmill mini,” tutur Hari. Tidak memiliki izin dan tanpa pengawasan, sehingga pemilik sawmill tersebut menampung kayu ilegal yang dijual masyarakat. Ada dugaan, masyarakat diberikan modal untuk menebang pohon di hutan. 
"Ini masih dalam pendalaman kita, Bisa jadi modal penebangan dari dia karena masyarakat jual ke dia," ulasnya. Menurut dia, Kabupaten Sekadau saat ini sedang dalam tahap pembangunan.Sehingga membutuhkan kayu olahan yang sangat besar. 
"Itulah sebabnya pengawasan industri mini (kayu) ini harus bersama-sama, tidak SPORC atau Polda saja," tutup Heri. (Ambrosius Junius/rk)

posts.text:
Home View All Jobs ( 2,177,418 ) Paychex Human Capital Management Sales Consultant in Costa Mesa , California 
More than just a paycheck.* Paychex is the leader in the small and mid-market space for Truly Human, Human Capital Management. We help business owners and leaders attract the best talent through streamlined human resource processes and benefits packages while at the same time maximizing the productivity of their employees once onboard. We often hear that the best thing about Paychex is our commitment to culture. Here you will find a company that rallies behind its values and builds its strategies around them. At Paychex, we value loyalty. Through hard work and ongoing growth and development, doors open. Many of our Executives came up through the ranks at Paychex, and for that we are #paychexproud. 
Only the best need apply.* We're on a journey to record-breaking revenue and we need only the best to join our team. Paychex representatives are relentlessly driven to be successful and are passionate about creating solutions that meet the needs of their clients. Our reps are sharp, impressive people who are leaders in their daily lives. 
All in. All the time.* The success of a Paychex rep depends on their ability to maximize their daily activity. This is a solution-based sales environment with an entrepreneurial spirit. The compensation plan rewards those who succeed and multiplier levels favor ongoing success. Integrated selling is the new norm as our clients' needs span multiple product lines and you are compensated for your team work. A portion of your leads will come from building external referral sources and a portion are developed from our internal team. There are dollars in the hustle and most leads are self-generated through a structured, proven activity plan. 
/ But enough about us, let's talk about you./ 
In this role, you will: 
Market and sell our suite of services by prospecting and acquiring new clients. 
Schedule appointments utilizing multiple communication channels (phone, email, marketing campaigns). 
Develop relationships with potential and current referral sources. 
Develop rapport and evaluate the business owner/decision maker?s Human Capital Management needs, determining which products are appropriate and referring to internal partners as needed. 
Project a positive image consistent with our values in representing Paychex to clients and the community. 
Strive to consistently gain technical, competitive and sales skills knowledge to stay agile and relevant in today?s business climate. So what are you waiting for?* If you're reading this and it sounds like we're writing about you, apply online at www.paychex.com/careers. Check out our leadership team on LinkedIn and get an inside peek at our culture @insidepaychex.

thread.section_title: A Pilgrim's Perspective
thread.title: GIVING AND RECEIVING
thread.title_full: GIVING AND RECEIVING

posts.author: A Pilgrim's Perspective (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: GIVING AND RECEIVING
posts.text:
I Was Just Thinking About – GIVING AND RECEIVING. 
As a follow-up to yesterday’s Blog on Little Or Much, there are more comprehensive guidelines in Scripture about both giving and receiving. One verse that serves as a good summary is Luke 6:38, “ Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured back to you.” This verse indicates there should be (a) commitment in giving, (b) disciplined giving, (c) generous giving, (d) the Lord’s abundant blessing for those who comply with this guideline. We should never get so focused on (d) the Lord’s abundant blessing, that we miss the joy of giving as described by Jesus Christ. 
These words coincide with the declaration of the Lord in Malachi 3:10, “Bring you all the tithes into the storehouse, that there may be food in my house, and test me now in this, says the Lord of hosts, if I will not open you the windows of heaven, and pour you out a blessing, that there shall not be room enough to receive it.” Once again, the Lord indicates he takes notice of the details of our lives – how we live and what we do. In Malachi’s day, the people had chosen to forget God, His directives, and His interaction with them. As a result, they had denied themselves of the relationship with the Lord and the benefits He was eager to make available to them. 
II Corinthians 9:6-8 (NLT) states the principle and benefit of giving on the basis of God’s instruction: “Remember this—a farmer who plants only a few seeds will get a small crop. But the one who plants generously will get a generous crop.  You must each decide in your heart how much to give. And don’t give reluctantly or in response to pressure. For God loves a person who gives cheerfully. And God will generously provide all you need. Then you will always have everything you need and plenty left over to share with others.” Have you personally proven this principle and received God’s benefit – His abundant blessing – because of your obedience to Him? If not, why not? If not now, when? 
There are ongoing opportunities for spiritual investment, especially at this time of the year: (1) Samaritan’s Purse and the Shoe Box ministry that will benefit children around the world; (2) Angel Tree ministry – both local and national - of providing gifts for the children of incarcerated prisoners; (3) Salvation Army meal provision for both Thanksgiving and Christmas locally and nationally; (4) Ministries that provide shelter and provisions for orphans and unwanted children (such as Big Oak Ranch in Birmingham, AL; Palmer Home for children in both Columbus and Hernando, MS; French Camp Academy in French Camp, MS; and many other worthy ministries who are reaching out to the needy and the unwanted in our nation and world. 
Prayerfully – consider these things with me.

вот вариант кстати...
но как все это удаленно замутить?
Прически будут в сорок лет.
А пока пусть используют внутренние резервы.
Игры на открытом воздухе, конкурсы, общение с природой.
В Коммунальнике и Колосе есть специальные мангальные зоны, прокат инвентаря.
Приехали, развлеклись, покормили белочек и уехали.

posts.title: Developments in Lebanon linked with victory of Resistance Movement in region
posts.text: Developments in Lebanon linked with victory of Resistance Movement in region  18 PM News Code : 865189 Source : MNA   Iranian Parliament’s General Director for International Affairs Hossein Amir-Abdollahian said the developments in Lebanon is associated with the victory of Lebanese Resistance Movement in the region. Hossein Amir-Abdollahian pointed to the strategic approach taken between US, Israel and Saudi Arabia for bringing about new arrangements in the region and added “malicious plots hatched by the three mentioned triangle in the region for using ISIS to annihilate and destroy Iraq and Syria were doomed to failure." For this reason, he said, they turned their face towards Lebanese Prime Minister Saad Hariri and forced him to resign in order to compensate their failure in the region.He called on the regional countries to be vigilant with regard to the increasing developments which are happening in the region and Lebanon.US government has come to this conclusion that the current closed sovereignty in Saudi Arabia cannot be responsive in this respect, he said, adding “moreover exerting more pressure to Saudi Arabian rulers, US government is trying to maintain them in order to continue rendering services to the Zionists and Americans.”United States and Zionists are vehemently interested in observing outbreak of tension and war between Iran and Saudi Arabia in the region. Under such circumstances, US government can take advantage of opportunity in its favor but they should know that their attempts will fail completely, Abdollahian maintained.Saudi Arabia has leveled the ground for US government in order to materialize its malicious objectives in the region, he said, adding “the situation is very sensitive in the region, because, objectives of parties, who were seeking significant change in Syria, Iraq and Yemen, doomed to failure. Currently, US and Israel are making their utmost efforts to destabilize situation in Lebanon.”Amir-Abdollahian concluded that the Lebanese Resistance movement has managed to gain salient achievements in line with bringing about stability in the region./323
